name: Roamer (Blue claws entertainment)
description:
Roamer is a game about rovers and (soon) modding!

Collect surface samples, survive dust storms, and get money to buy new rovers!

Controls:

WASD = movement

Space = stop the rover, and charge it with solar panels.

z = (enter/exit) samples & components screen.

f = (enter/exit) finance/store screen.

q = (enter/exit) quests screen.

m = (enter/exit) planets screen, press enter to change the planet.

[ ]= change controlled rover
